    • Method Detail

      • isConsistent

        public boolean isConsistent()
        Description copied from interface: IChangeAwareMondixInstance
        Returns true iff the entire mondix instance is in a consistent state.

        Guarantees if true is returned:

        • All queries of the mondix instance return mutually consistent results.
        • Changing the model must be tolerated at this point.

        See IConsistencyCallback for more guarantees.

        Specified by:
        isConsistent in interface IChangeAwareMondixInstance

      • addConsistencyListener

        public void addConsistencyListener(IConsistencyCallback consistencyListener)
        Description copied from interface: IChangeAwareMondixInstance
        The given listener will be notified of consistency points from now on.

        See IConsistencyCallback for guarantees.

        Specified by:
        addConsistencyListener in interface IChangeAwareMondixInstance

      • removeConsistencyListener

        public void removeConsistencyListener(IConsistencyCallback consistencyListener)
        Description copied from interface: IChangeAwareMondixInstance
        The given listener will no longer be notified of consistency points from now on.
        Specified by:
        removeConsistencyListener in interface IChangeAwareMondixInstance

      • getBaseRelationByName

        public ChangeAwareMondixRelation<? extends AbstractRow> getBaseRelationByName(java.lang.String relationName)
        Description copied from interface: IMondixInstance

        Specified by:

        relationName - the name of the relation to return
        Returns:
        the single relation whose name is the given string, or null if none exists

      • getCatalogRelation

        public IChangeAwareMondixRelation getCatalogRelation()
        Description copied from interface: IMondixInstance
        Returns the catalog relation that lists all relations published by this mondix instance.

        The catalog relation is guaranteed to:

        • contain a column called "name" that indicates the names of each published relation (including the catalog itself)
        • have the empty string as name

        Equivalent to calling IMondixInstance.getBaseRelationByName(String) with an empty string parameter

        Specified by:
        getCatalogRelation in interface IMondixInstance
        Overrides:
        getCatalogRelation in class MondixInstance<Row extends AbstractRow>
